cmd: sh -c "logstash -e 'input { kafka { group_id => \"logstash-backend-api-logs-new\" client_id => \"logstash-backend-api-logs\" bootstrap_servers => \"kafka.service.consul:9092\" topics => [\"jangl.frontend.backend_api_log\"] decorate_events => true auto_offset_reset => \"earliest\" codec => avro_schema_registry { endpoint => \"http://$HOST:8081\" } value_deserializer_class => \"org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.ByteArrayDeserializer\" } } filter { date { match => [ \"timestamp\", \"UNIX_MS\" ] } } output { elasticsearch { hosts => [\"http://backend-api-elasticsearch.service.consul:9200\"] } }'"
